Colleges Accepted

Learn How to Code
And Build

Coding Mind students are accepted into top universities throughout the country. Engaging courses taught by experienced instructors provide developmental, pre-college experiences. Join us in our mission of bringing STEM education to K-12 students.

Our interactive, hands-on, and fun programs will teach students how to create applications published in the appstore, develop video games, or even program a robot.

Our Programs

Your Options at Coding Mind

  • Group Classes

    Enroll in any class with a small group format taught by one of our experienced instructors.

  • Enrichment Project Programs

    Sign up to learn the skills to complete an enrichment project to gain practical experience.

  • 1-on-1 Class

    Get private tutoring by one of our instructors on any class of your choice.

Group Classes

Students come together to learn or practice coding to create software, mobile apps, websites, and other computer programs. The group setting allows for students to learn from each other, collaborate and share their knowledge. Group classes are led by an instructor who are experienced in the specific coding language or technology being taught.

  • Improve Social Skills
  • Pool Knowledge and Ideas
  • Share Diverse Perspectives
Learn More

Enrichment Project Programs

Students will take on an enrichment project in a field of their choice: software, game development, robotics, etc. They will be mentored by a Coding Mind instructor teaching them the skills to successfully complete an impressive project. Gain lifelong skills and aspire for growth with our enrichment programs!

  • Reach Your Full Potential
  • Gain Confidence and Leadership Skills
  • Master Skills At Your Own Pace
Learn More

1-on-1 Class

Instruction is tailored to an individual student's needs, interacting with one teacher individually fitting your learning goals. Each class is tailored specifically to a student's personal pace helping for concentration and deep learning.

  • At Your Own Pace
  • Practice Specific Skills To Mastery
  • Deeper and Wider Learning
Learn More
OUR COURSES

A Course For Every Pathway

We tailor courses for every level of coding experience.

From block coding to advanced programming, any student can become a Coding Mind!

  • L1: Block Coding
  • L2: Introduction to Programming
  • L3: Intermediate Programming
  • L4: Applied Programming
  • L5: Advanced Programming
Explore all courses
